title: [Self-Directed] Customized Educational Solution Design for Improving IT-Based Mathematical Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A digital learning environment focused on practical mathematics education to improve work efficiency for office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic statistical analyses (e.g., mean, variance calculations) required in business documents with 80% accuracy
Learners can complete financial budget plan creation using spreadsheet tools with 90% accuracy
Learners solve at least three real-world case assignments per week through interactive problem-solving modules provided on online learning platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
